answers.answer: Hi, how old are you? Any history  of diabetes or hypertension? Causes could be neuropathy, TIA, anxiety, hypokalemia(low potassium levels), vitamin B deficiency, thyroid disorder etc.Try a course of vitamin B, and get your Hemoglobin levels done along with peripheral smear.

question: FOR THE LAST 3 DAYS I HAVE EXPERIENCED LEG CRAMPS AND TINGLING IN THE FINGERS. THERE HAS BEEN NO VIGOROUS EXERCISE INVOLVED. IS THIS SOMETHING TO BE WORRIED ABOUT?This discussion is related tohttp://www.medhelp.org/posts/show/297318.
title: cramps
